description: Version of the data model that is reported on
name: datamodel_version

description: Version of the app that created this data
name: app_version

description: Maker of the phone where the app is running
name: phone_maker

description: Model of the phone where the app is running
name: phone_model

description: Version of the OS running on the phone
name: os_version

description: UUID4 uniquely identifying a phone where the app is running
name: user_id

description: Timestamp in epoch milliseconds when the data was generated
name: timestamp

description: String identifying the type of data this record is about
name: type

description: String identifying the name of the screen that was visible when this record was generated
name: screen

description: String identifying the action performed by the user that led to the record generation
name: action

description: Timestamp in milliseconds identifying when the current screen was created
name: screen_start

description: Timestamp in milliseconds identifying when the current screen ended
name: screen_end

description: Timestamp in milliseconds identifying when the current session started
name: session_start

description: String identifying an exception that was caught
name: exception_code

description: String containing the stack trace that was caught
name: stack_trace

description: Timestamp in milliseconds identifying when the session was about to end
name: session_end

description: Duration of the session in milliseconds
name: session_duration

description: Number of scans that were realized during the session
name: number_scans

description: Hash of the entire row to allow for an easy deduplication
name: _hash
